item.title: PI Reformat Please
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

Well, for Project Insanity client, the custom items dont go in class8, they go in ItemDef.

You have the arrays as

class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip";

Read full topic
